title: Midcentury Now
name: Midcentury Now
description: ...some scholars date this site to the early or mid-21st century, but this may be spurious...
author: Cathy
tagline: ...some scholars date this site to the early or mid-21st century, but this may be spurious...
sidebar: I want to learn about large language models. This site is about my attempts to understand how they work, as well as their implications. My background is far from technical, but I'm still deeply curious.
